channel.title: NPR Topics: News
channel.description: NPR news, audio, and podcasts. Coverage of breaking stories, national and world news, politics, business, science, technology, and extended coverage of major national and world events.
channel.copyright: Copyright 2024 NPR - For Personal Use Only

item.title: Meet Frederick Richard, the TikTok U.S. gymnast who is competing for another Olympic medal
item.description: The U.S. men's gymnastics team hasn't won an individual medal since 2016 and, before the Paris Olympics, hadn't medaled in the team all-around since 2008. Olympic rookie Frederick Richard isn't done yet.
item.content:encoded: The U.S. men's gymnastics team hasn't won an individual medal since 2016 and, before the Paris Olympics, hadn't medaled in the team all-around since 2008. Olympic rookie Frederick Richard isn't done yet.
item.dc:creator: Becky Sullivan

item.title: Unless you're all about the Olympics, keeping track of the events can be tough
item.description: NR's Steve Inskeep gets an update from NPR's Becky Sullivan, who's in France, about what to watch for in the Games.
item.content:encoded: NR's Steve Inskeep gets an update from NPR's Becky Sullivan, who's in France, about what to watch for in the Games.

item.title: Hamas leader killed in Iran. And, U.S. women's gymnastics is back on top
item.description: Ismail Haniyeh, a top Hamas political leader, is dead after a targeted raid in Iran, according to the group. And, Simone Biles leads Team USA to win all-round gymnastics gold.
item.content:encoded:
Ismail Haniyeh, a top Hamas political leader, is dead after a targeted raid in Iran, according to the group. And, Simone Biles leads Team USA to win all-round gymnastics gold.

(Image credit: Vahid Salemi)
item.dc:creator: Brittney Melton

item.title: Arizona local official who defended elections against GOP attacks is ousted in primary
item.description: Stephen Richer, who’s been a fierce defender of the integrity of Maricopa County elections since he was elected as county recorder, has lost a Republican primary to keep that role.
item.content:encoded:
Stephen Richer, who’s been a fierce defender of the integrity of Maricopa County elections since he was elected as county recorder, has lost a Republican primary to keep that role.

(Image credit: Olivier Touron)
item.dc:creator: Ben Giles

item.title: The once-mighty U.S. swim team sinks in early Olympic races, winning only two gold
item.description: The once-mighty U.S. Olympic swim team has only won two gold medals so far at the Paris Games. Athletes say the sport has grown more competitive since Americans like Michael Phelps owned the pool.
item.content:encoded:
The once-mighty U.S. Olympic swim team has only won two gold medals so far at the Paris Games. Athletes say the sport has grown more competitive since Americans like Michael Phelps owned the pool.

(Image credit: Matthias Schrader)
item.dc:creator: Brian Mann

item.title: How will Kamala Harris' presidential bid figure in to legislative and state races?
item.description: NPR's Steve Inskeep asks veteran political analyst and pollster Frank Luntz how Kamala Harris's entry into the presidential race might affect the fight for control of Congress.
item.content:encoded: NPR's Steve Inskeep asks veteran political analyst and pollster Frank Luntz how Kamala Harris's entry into the presidential race might affect the fight for control of Congress.
item.dc:creator: A Martínez

item.title: Hamas accuses Israel of killing its top political leader while he was in Tehran
item.description: NPR's Steve Inskeep talks to Trita Parsi, executive vice president of the Quincy Institute for Responsible Statecraft, about the ramifications of the assassination of Hamas leader Ismail Haniyeh.
item.content:encoded: NPR's Steve Inskeep talks to Trita Parsi, executive vice president of the Quincy Institute for Responsible Statecraft, about the ramifications of the assassination of Hamas leader Ismail Haniyeh.
item.dc:creator: Steve Inskeep

item.title: He has a badge and a gun — and he investigates school truancy
item.description: When students miss lots of school without an excuse, it’s known as truancy — and in Madison County, Ind., it can lead to a visit from truancy investigator Mitch Carroll.
item.content:encoded: When students miss lots of school without an excuse, it’s known as truancy — and in Madison County, Ind., it can lead to a visit from truancy investigator Mitch Carroll.
item.dc:creator: Dylan Peers McCoy

item.title: Paris Games are being hailed as the ‘gender-equal’ Olympics. Let's take a closer look
item.description: The Olympics movement has made considerable gains in evening the playing field for female athletes. But there’s a lot more to the effort than the headline achievement organizers have been pushing.
item.content:encoded:
The Olympics movement has made considerable gains in evening the playing field for female athletes. But there’s a lot more to the effort than the headline achievement organizers have been pushing.

(Image credit: Dolores Ochoa)
item.dc:creator: Emma Bowman

item.title: In China, Trump has cachet but few see U.S. ties improving under him or Harris
item.description: Former President Donald Trump thumps Vice President Harris in name recognition and cache, but analysts say Beijing sees both as bad news.
item.content:encoded:
Former President Donald Trump thumps Vice President Harris in name recognition and cache, but analysts say Beijing sees both as bad news.

(Image credit: Oliver Bunic)
item.dc:creator: John Ruwitch
